content: I noticed that in nightly (and not stable) promoteds in constants are now actual promoteds (instead of us just removing the StorageDead annotations for the promoted temporaries). Did this happen during one of @ecstatic-morse 's PRs? I'm not complaining, I just don't remember this happening explicitly. See the MIR of https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=515c8b25e4a3ed312e46ca06aabceb70 on stable and nightly
I'll cc wg-const-eval on these kinds of PRs from now on
